text: I miss some other channels that have been taken down (Remember Garudoh? author: kyla the casual gorl

text: Concerning this whole YouTube Copyright mess (which it is), I've been getting tons of messages of support and I just want to thank all of you, it's appreciated. However, it has yet to affect my channel. I already have a lot of ID Matches, so adding more of them won't change anything. I just hope some of my videos won't be plastered with the 30 seconds-type ads or have their audio removed, that'd be terrible. I give all my support to those truly affected by this, which is most of the YouTubers posting Let's Plays, doing game reviews, previews, blogs, etc. The past copyright system was completely flawed and Google responded with an overkill system that's even more flawed. The probable result? The big channels will get bigger, the small channels will get smaller or disappear. A big shame.
author: SupraDarky

text: I have an Android and this game is unfortunately only on the iOS. Looking at the screenshot, you can probably see that it's basically a Zelda clone majorly inspired by Wind Waker, and it seems like it's actually very good. Kenji Ito and Nobuo Uematsu both contributed some tracks, which is great.
